outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
urlmempool.comment: The url for the mempool blocks information. If you are running your own mempool.space service on MyNodeBTC, then use http://127.0.0.1:4080/api/v1/fees/mempool-blocks
urlfeerecs.comment: The url for the mempool fees recommendation. If you are running your own mempool.space service on MyNodeBTC, then use http://127.0.0.1:4080/api/v1/fees/recommended
urlfeehistogram.comment: The url for the mempool fee histogram data. If you are running your own mempool.space service on MyNodeBTC, then use http://127.0.0.1:4080/api/mempool
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use torify for privacy. Experimental
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBlockEdgeOutline.comment: The color to use for the outline of block shapes expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBlockSide.comment: The color to use for the side of the block expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBlockTop.comment: The color to use for the top of the block expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
blockSatLevels.comment: An array of sat level fee definitions with creating the mempool blocks

blockSatLevels.satMin.comment: The minimum sat/vbyte value to apply this colorset
blockSatLevels.satMax.comment: The maximum sat/vbyte value to apply this colorset
blockSatLevels.colorBlock.comment: The color to use for the face of the block when the sat/vbyte is within range of satMin-satMax
blockSatLevels.colorText.comment: The color to use for the text of the block when the sat/vbyte is within range of satMin-satMax

histogramSatLevels.comment: An array of sat level fee definitions with creating the histogram chart

histogramSatLevels.satMin.comment: The minimum sat/vbyte value to apply this colorset
histogramSatLevels.satMax.comment: The maximum sat/vbyte value to apply this colorset
histogramSatLevels.colorFill.comment: The color to use for the graph portion when the sat/vbyte is within range of satMin-satMax

blocksToRender.comment: The maximum number (1-6) of upcoming blocks to render which will influence the size of the blocks drawn
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
